column5: 저는 헬스장 가기 전에는 아무것도 안 먹어요.
column6: I usually don`t eat before the gym.
I will be back before lunch.

column5: 수업 시작하기 전에 이야기 좀 할 수 있을까?
column6: Can I talk to you before class?
Let me call you back after dinner.
Let`s go for a walk after work.
What do you usually do after church?
I head straight to my tennis lesson.
What are you doing after the gym?
I need to head back to work.
You`re so busy. What about after work?
I`m meeting my husband for a drink.
